channel.title: VR on jmsbrdy.com
channel.description: Recent content in VR on jmsbrdy.com

item.title: Prototype: Virtual Reality e-commerce
item.description: At Teespring we have quarterly hackathons. We all throw suggestions into a melting-pot of ideas in the run-up to the event, with the most promising, most interesting, and most popular suggestions graduating to be hacked upon by a small team for a couple of days.
